summary: The module defines two AWS CDK stack configurations used in integration tests to assess the S3IgnorePublicACLs security rule: one stack deliberately creates an S3 bucket with public ACLs enabled to trigger a failure, and another stack creates a bucket with public ACLs ignored to demonstrate compliance.
business_intent: To provide test fixtures that verify the detection of insecure public ACL settings on S3 buckets and confirm that compliant configurations pass, supporting automated security validation in CI/CD pipelines.
